meta.title: Janmashtami 2025 | College Events
meta.description: Celebrate the birth of Lord Krishna with bhajans, a Dahi Handi competition, and midnight aarti on August 26, 2025.

about.title: About The Festival
description: Experience the divine atmosphere of Janmashtami on campus. We will celebrate the birth of Lord Krishna with an evening filled with devotion, excitement, and community spirit.

The highlight of the evening will be the inter-department Dahi Handi competition, a thrilling display of teamwork and strategy. This will be followed by a serene Bhajan Sandhya and a grand midnight aarti at the campus temple.

highlights.title: Last Year's Dahi Handi
highlights.caption: Relive the excitement of last year's thrilling competition.

events.title: Bhajan Sandhya
events.details: Devotional songs by the music club

categories.title: Dahi Handi
categories.description: Witness the thrilling human pyramid competition.

categories.title: Midnight Aarti
categories.description: Participate in the sacred midnight prayer.

articles.title: Janmashtami Celebrations Announced
articles.excerpt: Witness the Dahi Handi competition and join the midnight aarti.

questions.question: Can anyone participate in the Dahi Handi?
questions.answer: Participation is open to teams pre-registered through their respective departments.
